content: sweet squishy and totally calorie-free this crochet cupcake is the cutest treat you ll ever make ✨ whether you re whipping one up as a gift a toy or just because it makes you smile this free crochet cupcake pattern is quick fun and beginner-friendly this pattern includes - easy-to-follow written instructions - full step-by-step video tutorial - materials list super bulky chenille yarn safety eyes polyfill 4 5mm hook - tips for customization this cupcake pattern will quickly become a fan favorite for its cuteness and simplicity you ll love how quickly it works up and how well it sells at markets skill level beginner file format pdf great for craft fairs gifts stress-free makes ***size*** 3 5 w x 4 5 h inches ***skill*** advanced beginner ***this pattern uses us crochet terms*** ready to crochet your own no-sew cupcake download the pdf pattern or view it for free not printable on my website and start crocheting today the pattern can be purchased here as an ad-free printer-friendly pdf > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership the crochet club which includes over > 500 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials more info about the membership is > here 1 ***you can also get this pattern in a no-sew amigurumi ebook with 30 crochet patterns and 15+ video tutorials and tips right here 2 *** 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/no-sew-amigurumi-made-easy/ ref=ravelry
